content:
In Minecraft, how can I *TASK* from scratch? Specify each step. Output as a list of tasks, as well as the condition of inventory for each step (i.e. 4 logs)
Format:
Task:  (like "collect wood")
Stop condition: (This is the condition to stop the task, like "log*4", only to include the item related to this task, no other items in the inventory)
Every task should have a clear stop condition.
Make item name as simple as possible, like "log", "plank".
